title: Topic 004 Question 027
body: A company purchases IoT devices to monitor manufacturing machinery. The company uses an Azure IoT Hub to communicate with the IoT devices.
The company must be able to monitor the devices in real-time.
You need to design the solution.
options: Azure Analysis Services using Azure PowerShell
Azure Stream Analytics Edge application using Microsoft Visual Studio
Azure Analysis Services using Microsoft Visual Studio
Azure Data Factory instance using Azure Portal
